wordageddon.service

Class AuthenticationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • wordageddon.service.AuthenticationService

  • public class AuthenticationService
extends <any>
    JavaFX Service for handling user authentication in the background. This service manages login and registration operations without blocking the UI thread.
    Since:
    2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gregorio Barberio, Francesco Peluso, Davide Quaranta, Ciro Ronca
